name: OR_CASE_RESCHED
description: The OR_CASE_RESCHED table contains OR management system case reschedule information.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the rescheduling information for the case.

columns.name: RESCHEDULE_SER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider the case is rescheduled with.

columns.name: RESCHEDULE_NEED_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value indication the reason the reschedule is needed.

columns.name: RESCHEDULE_CMT
columns.description: The rescheduling comment of the rescheduled case.
